title: PBE Closed signup
body: Hi... I have a couple of friends who all play together on the PBE server and they were telling me to send in an application, but currently applications arent being taken. I read that this is due to some critical issues on the web page that need to be fixed. This notice came out 5 months ago so I waa wondering if theres an estimated time for the site to be up amd fully functioning. Also I was wondering how long it takea to here back from riot abouy youre application after you semd it in.

replies.body: PBE sign ups and account creation are down for maintenance.  I don't have any additional information on this I'm afraid, but our devs are using the [PBE Status Page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for updates.  Hang tight until then!
